name: Beat Machine - Music Drum Pads
description:
Ever dreamed of recording your own music tracks? A fully functional recording studio is at your disposal. It's time to drop the beat and share it with the world!

FEATURES:

VARIOUS MUSIC STYLES
Select music style you like most: Hip-Hop, EDM, House, Dubstep, etc.

WEEKLY SOUND UPDATES
High-quality audio samples are carefully produced by professional musicians on weekly basis.

MULTI-SEQUENCER
Make a set of cool loops and mix them in any order while recording a track.

ADJUSTABLE METRONOME
Adjust the tempo and turn on metronome click to stay at a steady pace while recording.

TAP TEMPO FEATURE
Tap metronome button at any pace to adjust the tempo quickly.

QUICK RECORDING & SHARING
Record and share your music with friends and family!

Get the app and start making music now!

Created with love by Dream App Studio team.

The app contains the following subscription options:
Weekly subscription
Monthly subscription
Yearly subscription

Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours prior to the end of the current period. The cost of renewal is equal to the value that “Apple’s App Store Matrix” determines as the equivalent of the subscription price in $USD. Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication. Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user’s Account Settings after purchase.

Privacy Policy: http://dreamappstudio.com/privacy_policy.html
Terms of Service: http://www.dreamappstudio.com/terms_of_use.html
